TopicTitle: a challenge i have set myself

Articles.Content:
my dad programs dicom and i recently wanted a oculus rift

so my dad gave me this proposal

"make dicom work with the oculus rift and i'll buy one for you"

what i think i will do is import dicom into unity first as it has native support for the rift

ok first part is the hardest

dicom models are voxels

but unity only supports mesh

so voxel to mesh

any suggestions?
